name: 8-bit Knock Out!
description:
Knock out your opponent in this hardcore pixel-art fighting game!

Rules:
  • The more damage you take, the more damage you deal.
  • Rack up bountiful combos to push your opponent even further!
  • Try to get your enemy off the level.
  • Practice first in Training mode, where the opponent will only focus on not falling off. The Solo AI is quite tough!
  • If you have a bud, try out Party mode for local multiplayer fun!
Controls:

Player 1 - Arrow Keys + Enter

Player 2 - WASD + E

(You can use both configurations if you're playing solo)

Left Right / A D - Move

Up / W - Jump (you can triple jump and wall jump)

Down / S - Shield (while standing on the ground)

Enter / E - Dash: this is your attack. Dash while holding direction keys to dash in that direction. Dash into an opponent to attack them.

Esc - Pause game
